name: Michael Saraino
text: Typical fast food pizza.  Not great. But for the cost and quality, they're hard to beat. Food is made to order. Not sitting in a heat rack waiting for you to purchase. Consistently good.

name: crystal Lubitz
text: Had no problems ordering ...my food was decently priced.. Pizza delivery was on point didnt take too long for the food ...it was fresh cooked all the way through... presentation was awesome.. good job Hungry Howie's my kids love your â€¦More

name: Russ Patterson
text: Out of 102 orders (it says it on the receipt...lol #2020sucks) I only had 1 time my order was messed up.  That sounds like a 99.02% chance of a successful and delicious pizza!!!  I'd label that as ordering Hungry Howie's is a sure bet. â€¦More

name: Mizz Jaxon
text: When I order pizza from HH I ALWAYS request extra cheese. Itâ€™s NEVER on there. Sometimes I call there (after ordering online) just to make sure they put the extra cheese on there and I hear the irritation. Iâ€™m not trying to be irritating. â€¦More

text: This location was very rude and their customer service was very bad! They messed up on my pizza and didnâ€™t  want to give me a refund. The male manager said they remade my pizza for me but I never told him to remake it or that I was picking â€¦More

name: Jack Wynns
text: Overpriced me after I asked the dude at the register multiple times if that was the cheapest pizza I could get it was 4 dollars more but I do not make much money. DO NOT RECOMMEND!! Nasty pizza too falling apart and barely any toppings.

text: Ordered late. Thin crust with pepperoni and double green peppers and well done. ON POINt!! Totally the BEST pizza I have ever had!!! Thank you Hungry Howieâ€™s Pizza on Merriman!! You ROCK!!

name: Mandy Graham
text: I come to this location nearly every weekend. Best staff.. Hands down! Every employee I've ever encountered has been friendly, personable, and full of smiles. Great job staff! And props to the hiring manager for putting together such an awesome team. ã‚·

The smallest most disgusting wings I've ever had. They should be embarrassed for even selling these.

text: Pizza was amazing! Fast service. Friendly staff. They are open for lunch too :)

name: Chris Bacon
text: I remember it being better. I haven't had a pizza here in years. I won't be ordering here again. It was worse than the Little Caesar's and cost more.

name: craig snapp
text: Totally awesome dude

name: Tiffany Kerr
text: I love the pizza it's really great. The flavored crust makes me smile. Cajun is really my favorite but my family can't eat it. So just get whatever you want. There is a crust for all. Hear me when I say try feta cheese on your pizza. There I said it!

name: Michael Johnson
text: 4 stars. This is not gourmet pizza. It is good, don't get me wrong, but it is a fast delivery service. If you want fast pizza that tastes good then this is the place for you. The flavored crusts are a must-try. The drivers are super friendly, and deserve raises for what they do. Nice job, HH.

name: Kathy Vomastek
text: The pizza is Absolutely Delicious every time! It doesn't matter if it's a Monday at 5:00 or a Saturday at 6:00! And the ENTIRE crew is polite, happy, & ALWAYS have a smile on their face!ðŸ˜€
